review.reviewBody: The butter chicken was the most flavourful I’ve ever had. It is so rich and creamy and thick. Delicious. We also ordered fish pakora which was very fresh.  would highly recommend  this place prices are very much reasonable.
doon special chicken is very tasty
Best food and homelike taste surely visit again
Great food! One of our favourite local restaurant

I think this place used to be Punje Spice, and they must've changed chefs because "mild" doesn't exist anymore. I ordered mild butter chicken, and it's easily medium. I also ordered papadum, and they came overdone and slightly burnt and were spicy - I've never had spicy papadum anywehre. The lacha parantha was also burnt on the edges, but the rest was okay. Mango lassi are definitely necessary for dealing with the spicy food, and thankfully the plain rice was actually plain.
